Yeah, don't you wait, don't think about it

chorus:

chorus:

I don't care if you do, ooh-ooh, ooh
'Cause in a sky, 'cause in a sky full of stars
I think I saw you ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh-ooh

title: Trap Queen
chorus:
And I get high with my baby 
I just left the mall, I'm gettin' fly with my baby, yeah
And I can ride with my baby 
I be in the kitchen cookin' pies with my baby, yeah

title: MIDDLE CHILD
chorus:
I just poured somethin' in my cup

Promise I am never lettin' up
Money in your palm don't make you real
Foot is on they neck, I got 'em stuck
I'ma give 'em somethin' they can feel

title: Daddy Issues
chorus:
Go ahead and cry, little girl

I know that you got daddy issues

chorus:
Just give me a reason
Just a little bit's enough
Just a second, we're not broken, just bent
And we can learn to love again
It's in the stars
It's been written in the scars on our hearts
We're not broken, just bent
And we can learn to love again

We crave a different kind of buzz
Let me be your ruler

title: Fast Car
chorus:

City lights lay out before us

chorus:

I knew that was the end of it all

'Cause now there ain't no letting you go

title: The Business
chorus:

chorus:

chorus:

title: Mockingbird
chorus:

Natural
